* City Council

City Council
============

City Council meetings are held on the 4th Wednesday of the month at 6:00 p.m. Unless otherwise specified, all meeting take place in the LeeRoy Kieschnick Council Chamber located at City Hall, 203 East Main Street and are open to the public. Citizens are encouraged to attend City Council meetings as a way to actively participate in the process of government. If have any questions about the City Council meetings, please contact City Secretary; Delma Salinas at 361-584-2567 ext. 110.
